mapper.select: select * from f_member order by mem_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into f_member (mem_num, mem_id, mem_passwd, mem_name, mem_nickname, mem_mode, mem_regdate, mem_report, mem_hp1, mem_hp2, mem_hp3) values (#{mem_num}, #{mem_id}, #{mem_passwd}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_nickname}, #{mem_mode}, sysdate, 0, #{mem_hp1}, #{mem_hp2}, #{mem_hp3})
mapper.update: update f_member set mem_passwd='123456789' where mem_num=#{mem_num}
update f_member set mem_nickname='0' where mem_num=#{mem_num}
update f_member set mem_img = NULL where mem_num=#{mem_num}
update f_member set mem_report=0 where mem_num=#{mem_num}
update f_member set mem_msg = NULL where mem_num=#{mem_num}
